detail: James "Jimmy" De Santa (born James Townley) is the son of Michael and Amanda, and the younger brother of Tracey. Danny Tamberelli portrays Jimmy. Despite Michael's attempts to bond with his son, they have a confused relationship, and Jimmy and his sister have a hateful relationship. In particular, Michael is frustrated by his son's lack of ambition, as Jimmy spends most of his time in his room, getting high and playing video games. At one point early in the game, Jimmy attempts to sell his father's yacht, however it is then stolen with him inside, and Michael and Franklin are forced to save him.[60] Later on, Jimmy tricks his father into drinking a spiked beverage, before stealing his car, money, and moving out of the house with his mother and sister. Later on in the game, Jimmy and Michael start re-uniting the family and the family return to their house with Michael, it is then hinted for the rest of the game that Jimmy is attempting to get in shape and may be applying for college.
